title: ecommerce add editor
job_overview:
Responsibilities

- Edit engaging video and image ads tailored for Meta (FB/IG) placements
- Chop up raw footage and assemble compelling creatives from multiple sources like tiktok, instagram.
- Add visuals, sound effects, smooth transitions, subtitles, and voice-overs
- Test and iterate on different editing styles to boost ad performance

Requirements

- Experience editing short-form video content (e.g. TikTok, Reels, Stories, Ads)
- Proficiency in tools like CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar
- Strong understanding of hooks, storytelling, pacing, and ad structure
- Experience with e-commerce and performance marketing creatives
- Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and follow creative briefs
